name: Beacon of the Reed Sea
title: Desert Watch: Beacon of the Reed Sea
desc: "On top of the ruins of the pool where the regalia of past executions of offenders was excavated, those who had lost the dream of the desert, yet were unwilling to give up their vast sea of sand gathered.\nIn the name of the Reed Sea that never existed, they connected with the dream that was promised to them..."
